title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Tesla & Bitcoin (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Tesla & Bitcoin (Podcast)
description:
On this week’s Bloomberg Intelligence podcast, Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney discuss the tech industry with companies including Tesla and Apple. They also get into Bitcoin and cryptocurrency regulation. Bloomberg Intelligence provides in-depth research and data on more than 2,000 companies and 130 industries. Hosts: Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney Producers: Richard Trueman and Madena Parwana

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
